subject: WooCommerce Upgrade - Special Offer
preview: Hello, Christmas Holidays are around the corner. Customers are ready to return to E-Commerce in large numbers. It is the best time to surprise your customers with a new and fresh website look. We will

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hello,

Christmas Holidays are around the corner. Customers are ready to return to E-Commerce in large numbers.

It is the best time to surprise your customers with a new and fresh website look.

We will revamp your store, enhance the design and upgrade the version to increase your brand value, traffic, and sales.

As a special offer, we are charging a fixed price of $1,600 USD to upgrade your WooCommerce/WordPress sites.

This Offer is Valid from 06-December-2022 to 23-December-2022.

We will include the following tasks in this project:

  1. Analysis of your current site and suggestions for improvements
  2. Upgrade an existing WooCommerce Store to latest version (Based on Themes).
  3. Upgrade your WooCommerce Store to a modern and better design by using a new WooCommerce Theme
  4. Theme suggestions based on your domain and business.
  5. Addition of new Google Analytics (GA4)
  6. Addition of Advanced Event-Based Analytics
  7. Automated Daily, Weekly and Monthly Reports which will be delivered to your inbox, and have critical information about revenue, top selling products, top search queries on Google etc.
  8. Home Page Customization
  9. Customization of the Product page
  10. Customization of the Category page
  11. Customization of the Cart page
  12. Home page banners (3 banners)
  13. Setup of site's structure, homepage and navigation
  14. Mobile Responsive site setup
  15. Setup of site category (collections)
  16. Delivery in 5-6 Weeks
  17. 2 Weeks of bug fixing support post-delivery

Terms & Conditions:

  1. Pay only 50% to book this offer, the balance can be paid when development is completed and before making the site live.
  2. The original price was $4,000 USD. The special discounted price is $1,600 USD.
  3. You need to buy the new theme, which would be an extra cost.
  4. Any extension, plugin, hosting and software should be bought and paid by you.
  5. Old plugins and themes may not be compatible with new versions. We may need to work on alternative extensions and themes.
  6. We will need a Development environment to create the upgraded store. You need to provide a new server for creating the development environment.
  7. This offer is not valid for a very complex or customized store development. You can ask for a quote for that.
  8. This offer is valid only from 06-December-2022 to 23-December-2022.

You can check some of our WooCommerce/WordPress work at https://firstwireapp.com/portfolio.html

Thanks & Regards,

Selena Jara

Unsubscribe
